docs.lead_paragraph: A reception for Louis Lipsky, President of the Zionist Organization of America, held last night at the Level Club, 253 West Seventy third Street, in celebration of his return a few days ago from the international Zionist Congress at Berlin, turned into on enthusiastic rally for "united Zionism."

docs.snippet: With the disclosure by Police Inspector Ernest Van Wagner of Staten Island that Sergeant Albert L. Smith of the Army Ordnance Department at Camp Dix, N.J., wanted in connection with the killing of his wife, was seen last Sunday night leaving for t...
docs.lead_paragraph: With the disclosure by Police Inspector Ernest Van Wagner of Staten Island that Sergeant Albert L. Smith of the Army Ordnance Department at Camp Dix, N.J., wanted in connection with the killing of his wife, was seen last Sunday night leaving for the West, the local and Federal authorities concentrated their search yesterday in that part of the country.
